author: Team ECI
title: ECI® Presents Webinars to Address the Latest Affordable Care Act Reporting Requirements
text:
ECI® , a leading provider of Human Capital Management software, announced today they are hosting two webinars addressing the latest Affordable Care Act reporting requirements. Both webinar events are HRCI approved and attendees will be eligible for one hour of HRCI credit, courtesy of ECI. The webinars will be presented in partnership with Marathas, Barrow and Weatherhead. The first webinar, The Latest on the Affordable Care Act and Reporting Requirements, will take place on Tuesday, September 1, 2015, at 2 p.m. EST. Stacy Barrow, one of the nation’s leading ACA experts, will be presenting an overview and update on recent events and regulatory guidance. To register for the Tuesday, Sept. 1 webinar, The Latest on the ACA and Reporting Requirements, click here .
The second webinar, ACA Reporting Requirements for Restaurants and Hospitality Employers, will take place on Wednesday, September 2, 2015, at 2 p.m. EST. Peter Marathas, a renowned Affordable Care Act speaker, will be providing restaurant and hospitality employers with specific regulation updates and requirements for their industry. To register for the Wednesday, Sept. 2 webinar, ACA Reporting Requirements for Restaurants and Hospitality, click here .
“Affordable Care Act requirements can be difficult to understand and navigate,” said Jeff Lacy, ECI President and CEO. “Our goal is to provide companies with the resources necessary to maintain compliance. Our expert partners from Marathas, Barrow and Weatherhead will be providing key ACA reporting information we know will be valuable to all employers.”
About ECI
Specializing in Human Capital Management solutions, ECI created its Empower software to provide mid-sized companies with a web-based, fully unified platform that covers the entire employee lifecycle. Users can seamlessly transition from one HR task to the next inside a secure, single database. Leveraging cloud-based, software-as-a-service (SaaS) deployment, single sign-on access and a variety of user-friendly features, Empower delivers the ability to streamline communication, automate workflows and simplify the user experience across a full scope of employee administration requirements. Learn more at http://www.ecipay.com or call 800-320-9530.
